title: Oregon Caves National Monument & Preserve: Special Volunteer Events
body: Special Volunteer Events         Volunteers from Public Lands Day 2009 NPS  Join us for one of our annual volunteer events when we provide a real service to Oregon Caves by picking lint and bits of trash along the cave tour path! No experience is necessary to participate, just a desire to restore the cave and ability to perform light physical work. Advance registration is required, as these events can fill up. National Park Service Volunteer Day Third Saturday in April National Public Lands Day Last Saturday in September
